capstone.objects

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.objects.Stats

  • public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    ALL STATS ARE PROVIDED BY HOCKEY-REFERENCE.COM Each stat line consists of a unique combination of a skater and a season. Raw numbers were downloaded from hockey-reference.com. Each stat line also contains an EPV (Estimated Player Value) that is calculated using an algorithm designed by this program's developer.

      • printStatLine

        public static void printStatLine(java.lang.String playerName,
                                 int seasonStartYear)
        Prints a stat line for the given player and season combination. Used only for development testing.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the skater being evaluated.
        seasonStartYear - The year the season being evaluated started.

      • setTopStats

        public static void setTopStats()
        Sets the top stat values for each season in the program. Called when the program is booted.

      • setEPVs

        public static void setEPVs()
        Sets the EPV for each stat line in the program. Called when the the program is booted.

      • setFuturePredictions

        public static void setFuturePredictions()
        Creates a list of predicted skater stats for the upcoming season and loads them into the program.

      • duplicateStats

        public static Stats duplicateStats(Stats base)
        Creates of copy of the given stats.
        Parameters:
        base - The stats being copied.
        Returns:
        A copy of the given stats.

      • getTopEPVs

        public static java.util.List<Stats> getTopEPVs(Season season,
                                               java.lang.String position,
                                               int numSkaters)
        Gets the top EPVs for a given season/position combination.
        Parameters:
        season - The season being evaluated.
        position - The position being evaluated.
        numSkaters - The size of the list being returned.
        Returns:
        A list of the top skaters from the given season/position combination.

      • calculateStatRating

        public static int calculateStatRating(Stats statLine,
                                      java.lang.String statStr)
        Calculates the rating of the given stat. Ratings are a scale of 1-100
        Parameters:
        statLine - The stat line being evaluated.
        statStr - The type of stat being evaluated.
        Returns:
        The stat's rating on a scale of 1-100.

      • adjustStatLine

        public static Stats adjustStatLine(Stats statLine)
        Returns stats the skater would've had if they played 20 minutes / night for a full season.
        Parameters:
        statLine - The stats to adjust.
        Returns:
        The adjusted stats.

      • isFromThisPosition

        public static boolean isFromThisPosition(Stats statLine,
                                         java.lang.String testPosition)
        Determines if the given stat line is of the given position.
        Parameters:
        statLine - The stat line being evaluated.
        testPosition - The position being tested for.
        Returns:
        True if the stat line is from the given position.
